documents.document: @Braxifen Or pick a random time zone. "MOUNTAIN Time? What the fuck is MOUNTAIN Time? DENIED!" *stamps*

@elonmusk "Not the best way". Such strong language of condemnation. You were a hero of mine not so long ago.
